page.title: 08Homelife in Langho
page.content: Most homes are well maintained . The main source of heating is gas or oil fired central heating . Kitchens are equipped with gas or electricity . Gadgets include washing machines , food mixers , dishwashers and microwaves . Living rooms are carpeted . Pictures are hung on decorated walls . The seating is for comfort and placed around the television . Lighting can be subtle or central to suit family needs. Most people use continental quilts and blankets are rarely seen . People follow their hobbies at home and spend a large proportion of their leisure time watching T.V. Gardening and cooking outdoors are popular home activities in this area . Pets are popular , particually cats and dogs .
